jt refers to the direct change in person-year (the amount of work done by one person in a year) required in industry j at time t, Î” Q
jt represents the biophysical changes (e.g., harvest volume, volume of harvest residue for bioenergy, or HWP or bioenergy production) due to strategy implementation, and k
